Notes.Text:
This update for python311 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2025-1795: Fixed mishandling of comma during folding and unicode-encoding of email headers (bsc#1238450).
Notes.Title: Details

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Public Cloud 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Public Cloud 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Public Cloud 15 SP4

Vulnerabilities.Description: During an address list folding when a separating comma ends up on a folded line and that line is to be unicode-encoded then the separator itself is also unicode-encoded. Expected behavior is that the separating comma remains a plan comma. This can result in the address header being misinterpreted by some mail servers.
